Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Arken
Reviews.Content: So far so good but only thing is I don't know how or where to DL the app that can watch live tv with TVB

Reviews.Title: 3D smart box is not smart.
Reviews.Author: shiwei  tong
Reviews.Content: I bought one HiMedia Q5-II Dual Core Blue Ray 3D Dual Launcher connecting with Samsung 3D TV. But when I watched the 3D program from Himedia the 3D results were less than desirable.  The show was unclear and the colors and images were blurry and split.
